pageDescription: Julio Sepia's resume - Frontend development and prototyping
title: Julio Sepia
subtitle: Frontend engineer
bio: I'm Julio, a frontend engineer with professional experience in UI design, full stack web development, graphic design, and game programming. If the job requires it, I'll learn it. In my current role as a design technologist, I work closely with stakeholders to design, research, and prototype effective user experiences.
